thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 20 of 288
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: We are having fun with our weekly box. The final results are really tasty and nutritious. We plan to continue throughout the Spring. The area fro improvement is the quantity/quality of the vegetables in some boxes. Sometimes the portions are tiny (like the 2 very small roasted parsnips side) and sometimes huge (like the 3 giant carrots side). Sometimes the potatoes are blackening and sometimes not. Everything else is just great.
